column5:
If you feel like your parents still blame you for your sister’s death, then maybe you need some space away from them. 
It was in no way your fault, and you need be allowed to forgive yourself for it, which might start by staying away from things that remind you of it.
The loss of one life is devastating, but it doesn’t mean that another should be lost to make up for it.

Probably going to be a very unpopular opinion, but ESH. She was being an asshole, but that didn’t give you the right to be just as inconsiderate as she was. Relationship wise, everyone should be allowed to talk about their own issues with their partners in their own time.
